column3: Players, Player Attributes, and Player Abilities

column14: Ability Description
Whenever this Player is moved into a square containing the ball, they pick it up, as though they were making a Run Action.
After this Player makes a Block Action, they may make a free Run Action of up to 2 spaces. This Run Action may be made if they are adjacent to an Opposition Player.
Opposition Players adjcanet to this Player can never Assist a Block Action.
When this Player makes a Run Action they can move adjacent to Opposition Players, but must end the Action Open.
If this Player makes a Run Action, followed by a Mark Action, they may make a free Block Action.
When this Player makes a Block Action, you can choose to re-roll results of Shove. When this Player is the target of a Block Action, treat results of Shove as Miss.
If this Player makes a Run Action, followed by a Mark Action, they may make a free Block Action.
When this Player is chosen as the target of a Block Action, they may Interrupt the Action and make a free Short Throw (or Hand-off) with no modifiers, even if they are Marked.
When this Player makes a Block Action, you can choose to re-roll the Block Dice.
After this Player makes a Mark Action, they may make a free Block Action against a Player they are now Marking.
If this Player is Knocked Down whilst holding the ball, you can choose which adjacent square the ball Bounces into instead of rolling a D8.
When this Player makes a Block Action, you can choose to re-roll the Block Dice.
After this Player makes a Mark Action, they may make a free Block Action against a Player they are now Marking.
Whenever this Player fails a Throw Check, they may re-roll the dice.
If this Player is Open and is the target of a successful Throw Action (not a Hand-off), they can make a free Run Action.
When this Player makes a Block Action, you can choose to re-roll the Block Dice.
When this Player is chosen as the target of a Block Action, they may Interrupt the Action and make a free Short Throw (or Hand-off) with no modifiers, even if they are Marked.
Block Actions that target this Player may not be Assisted.
When this Player makes a Run Action they can move adjacent to Opposition Players, but must end the Action Open. Additionally, this Player cannot make Throw Actions.
When this Player makes a Block Action, treat results of 'Tackle' and 'Smash!' as 'Kerrunch!.' In addition, if this Player is the target of a Block Action, treat results of 'Shove' as 'Miss.'

When this Player makes a Block Action, you must resolve the result of each Block Dice rolled, picking the order they are resolved in. For each result that causes the target to be Knocked Down, the opposing Coach must make an Armor Check for the target Player. This Player must always follow-up after a Shove result.
If this Player is Knocked Down whilst holding the ball, you can choose which adjacent square the ball bounces into instead of rolling a D8.

When this Player makes a Run Action, they can move adjacent to or through Opposition Players and through obstructions and Team-mates, but they must end the Action Open and not on a Player or obstruction.
When this Player makes a Block Action or Foul Action, roll a D6 along with the Block Dice. If the result is a 6, the target is automatically injured - do not resolve the Block Dice.
When this Player is the target of a Block Action, treat results of 'Shove' as 'Miss.'

This Player can make a Block Action whilst Open. Choose an Open or Marked Opposition Player within 3 squares to be the target. The Block Action cannot be assisted and treat results of 'Shove' as 'Miss.'
When this Player makes a Run Action they can move adjacent to and through Opposition Players and Team-mates, but must end the Action Open.

This Player can make a Run Action whilst Marked. When this Player makes a Run Action they can move adjacent to Opposition Players and finish the Action either Open or Marked. This Player's Block Actions cannot be assisted.
After the Pre-Turn Sequence, but before making your first Player Action, if this Player is prone, they can make a free Stand Up Action.
Whenever this Player is moved into a square containing the ball, they pick it up, as though they were making a Run Action.
When this Player makes a Block Action, treat results of 'Smash!' as 'Kerrunch!'

After this Player makes a Run Action, they may perform a free Hand-off Action.

When this Player makes a Mark Action, you may move an Opposition Player 1 square so that they are adjacent to this Player before, during, or after the Mark Action. You cannot move an Opposition Player with Hulking Brute ability.
When an adjcanet Team-mate would be Injured as a result of their Bloodlust Ability, you may choose for this Player to be Injured instead.

After resolving the Claim Challenge Card Step for a Block Action performed by this Player, if any of the Block Dice rolled showed a Miss, this Player is Injured. If they were holding a ball, it will Bounce.

This Player can make a free Sidestep Action.
